p: The new PPE and medical device designs that have emerged from the pandemic have not been through the extensive prototype testing that FDA-approved devices have been able to pass. It has not been confirmed as to whether the new devices effectively treat or harm users. The CDC has issued an official statement that recommends healthcare professionals to only use homemade masks (e.g., bandanas, scarves) for the care of patients with COVID-19 as a last resort, and focuses on maximizing current stores of PPE [ 60].
